mapper.select: SELECT b.fk_userid AS fkuserid, a.category_name AS category_name, b.challenge_name AS challengeName, b.thumbnail as thumbnail, b.content, b.startDate, b.fk_during_type, c.set_date, b.member_count, b.fk_category_code, a.category_code AS category_code, b.challenge_code AS challengeCode, f.frequency AS frequency FROM tbl_challenge b JOIN tbl_category a ON b.fk_category_code = a.category_code JOIN tbl_challenge_during c ON b.fk_during_type = c.during_type JOIN tbl_certify_freq f ON b.fk_freq_type = f.freq_type
